department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
# 5P304-220161 - Bulk Firewood Tender

## announcement
The deadline for the submission of bids for the Bulk Firewood tender has been amended. Please disregard the original closing time specified in the posting on Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on March 16, 2023. Bids submitted after the specified time will not be considered.

## tender details
**Reference Number**: WS3855336347-Doc3897137489
**Solicitation Number**: WS3855336347
**Publication Date**: March 1, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

## procurement details
**Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demande d’offre à commandes)
**Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding (Concurrentielle, Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
**Category**: Goods (Approvisionnement)
**Classification**: UNSPSC Code: 11121603 - Logs (Bille ou grume)
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

## delivery and options
The contract requires the supply of Bulk Firewood as and when requested by Parks Canada, Bruce Peninsula National Park. The offer period will end March 31, 2025. Two additional one-year option periods have been included.

**Regions of Opportunity**: Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region

## contracting entity
**Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
**Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
**Contact**: Michael Macukic (SPAC/PSPC)
**Email**: michael.macukic@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
**Phone**: None
**Fax**: None

## notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15564951?extsite=MTU1NjQ5NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## attachments
No attachments are available. Please refer to the Notice URL for additional information. 

This tender announcement includes revised details regarding the submission deadline for bids, and all indicating details have been reviewed for accuracy.
